|}}'''The Hobbit''' was a video game made by [[Bryce Fitzsimons]]. The story covers ''[[the Hobbit]]'', in which the player must reclaim the treasures of the [[Dwarves]] from [[Smaug]] the [[Dragons|Dragon]]. It was written by [[Bryce Fitzsimons]].
